results.idea: Post-news short-term momentum scaled by volume volatility
results.description: Uses multiple fields (news_pct_30min, news_vol_stddev). Applied SUGGESTION1 to combine price move and volume volatility; SUGGESTION2 not applied (no vector fields identified); SUGGESTION3 not needed (both coverages >0.6); SUGGESTION4 applied by choosing fields with high user/alpha counts. Confidence set to 0.78 based on strong coverage and prior literature on volume-scaled momentum.

results.idea: Earnings surprise continuation (EPS actual vs short-run drift)
results.description: Combines news_eps_actual and news_pct_60min to capture immediate drift after earnings. SUGGESTION1 applied; SUGGESTION2 not relevant; SUGGESTION3 not needed (high coverage); SUGGESTION4 applied (news_eps_actual high alphaCount). Confidence 0.74.

results.idea: ATR breakout momentum vs 20-day ATR
results.description: Uses news_atr_ratio and news_pct_120min to capture large-range moves continuing. SUGGESTION1 used; SUGGESTION3 not required (coverage >0.6); prioritized high userCount field news_atr_ratio. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Open-gap fade adjusted by market-relative move
results.description: Combines news_open_gap and news_indx_perf to fade extreme opens relative to market. SUGGESTION1 applied; news_open_gap coverage ~0.62 (just above 0.6) so no backfill; SUGGESTION4 partially applied. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: High short interest mean-reversion after large intraday sell-off
results.description: Combines news_short_interest and news_max_dn_ret to identify squeezable names. SUGGESTION1 used; SUGGESTION3 not needed (both >0.6); SUGGESTION4 applied (short_interest decent alphaCount). Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: VWAP reversion over first hour
results.description: Uses news_ton_last (time-of-news price) and news_eod_vwap to detect reversion toward session VWAP. SUGGESTION1 used; both fields high coverage so no backfill; prioritized fields with high alphaCount. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Volume spike breakout: curr_vol vs mov_vol scaled return
results.description: Combines news_curr_vol and news_mov_vol to favor moves when current > average and price moved. SUGGESTION1 used; news_curr_vol coverage >0.6; SUGGESTION4 considered (mov_vol high userCount). Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Post-news volatility contraction leading to trend continuation
results.description: Uses news_atr14 and news_range_stddev to detect volatility compression before continuation. SUGGESTION1 applied; both high coverage; confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Small-cap breakout filter (cap & pct30min)
results.description: Combine news_cap and news_pct_30min to overweight small-cap breakouts. SUGGESTION1 used; news_cap high userCount and coverage; scaled for risk. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Post-news 1-minute micro-momentum adjusted by tick activity
results.description: Uses news_pct_1min and news_tot_ticks to prefer moves on high tick activity. SUGGESTION1 used; both fields coverage high; SUGGESTION4 applied (tot_ticks high userCount). Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Overreaction fade: large 30-minute move and extreme high_exc_stddev
results.description: Combine news_pct_30min and news_high_exc_stddev to fade extreme deviations. SUGGESTION1 used; both fields high coverage; confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Pre-market pre_vwap gap continuation
results.description: Uses news_pre_vwap and news_pct_10min to trade continuation from pre-session imbalance. SUGGESTION1 applied; both coverages >0.6; confidence 0.62.

results.idea: EOD drift filter: ton_last vs eod_close momentum
results.description: Combines news_ton_last and news_eod_close to capture continued moves after news. SUGGESTION1 used; both high coverage; confidence 0.73.

results.idea: Post-news relative to SPY (alpha vs market)
results.description: Uses news_indx_perf and news_pct_60min to capture idiosyncratic moves relative to SPY. SUGGESTION1 applied; both high coverage and alphaCount. Confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Price range breakout scaled by volume z-score
results.description: Combines news_session_range_pct and news_vol_stddev to trade range breakouts backed by unusual volume. SUGGESTION1 applied; news_session_range_pct coverage low (~0.27) so applied SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill(5). Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Gap open continuation for high-peratio stocks
results.description: Combines news_open_gap and news_pe_ratio to pursue momentum in high multiple names. SUGGESTION1 used; both have strong coverage; confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Rapid 1-minute reversal after micro-spike
results.description: Uses news_mins_1_chg and news_pct_1min to detect micro spikes and quick reversals. SUGGESTION1 applied; both coverage >0.6; confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Post-news 5-min continuation after volatility breakout
results.description: Combines news_pct_5_min and news_mins_5_pct_up to identify persistent upticks. SUGGESTION1 applied; both coverage acceptable; confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Large after-news up move with low historical range: mean-reversion
results.description: Uses news_max_up_ret and news_range_stddev to catch overextensions. SUGGESTION1 applied; both fields high coverage; confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Low-volatility, high-momentum filter
results.description: Combines low news_atr14 with strong news_pct_30min to favor momentum in calmer names. SUGGESTION1 applied; ATR coverage high. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Post-news 30sec reaction strength scaled by ticks
results.description: Uses news_pct_30sec and news_tot_ticks to prefer robust micro-moves. SUGGESTION1 applied; both high coverage; confidence 0.7.

results.idea: Momentum persistence: 10min then 60min cross-check
results.description: Combine news_pct_10min and news_pct_60min to select persistent moves. SUGGESTION1 used; both strong coverage; confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Price-to-earnings reversion after intraday surge
results.description: Combines news_pe_ratio and news_pct_30min to short expensive names that spiked. SUGGESTION1 used; both high coverage and alphaCount. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: After-hours surprise continuation (afterhsz 10-min)
results.description: Uses nws12_afterhsz_10_min and nws12_afterhsz_volstddev to trade post-earnings after-hours moves continuing into session. SUGGESTION1 applied; applied SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill if needed (coverage moderate); confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum adjusted by market microstructure (open_vol)
results.description: Combines news_open_vol and news_pct_30min to favor moves with strong open participation. SUGGESTION1 used; news_open_vol coverage ~0.436 (low) so applied ts_backfill(5). Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Short-term mean reversion after large 120-minute move
results.description: Uses news_pct_120min and news_range_stddev to detect overextended 2-hour moves to fade. SUGGESTION1 applied; coverage good; confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Volume/price divergence (curr_vol up but price stagnant)
results.description: Combines news_curr_vol and news_pct_30min to find names where volume spikes without price response (potential accumulation). SUGGESTION1 applied; coverage okay. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Pre-news volatility predictor using prevday and atr
results.description: Uses news_prevday and news_atr_ratio to predict intraday range after news. SUGGESTION1 applied; prevday coverage ~0.73 acceptable. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by market-relative reaction (spy_last)
results.description: Combines news_spy_last and news_pct_60min to focus on idiosyncratic reactions. SUGGESTION1 used; both high coverage. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: High tick, low range momentum (liquid micro-trend)
results.description: Uses news_tot_ticks and news_session_range to find liquid names with small ranges but strong tick activity — continuation candidates. SUGGESTION1 used; news_session_range coverage low (~0.42) so applied ts_backfill(5). Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Gap-fill strategy using prevclose and dayopen
results.description: Combines news_prev_close (low coverage) and news_open to predict gap fills; applied SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill on prev_close. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.5 due to low prev_close coverage.

results.idea: Earnings magnitude scaled momentum (epsactual * pct_30min)
results.description: Combines news_eps_actual and news_pct_30min to prioritize stocks with strong EPS and follow-through. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.72.

results.idea: Short squeeze signal: low mins to up and high short_interest
results.description: Combines news_mins_1_chg and news_short_interest to capture quick up-moves in heavily shorted names. SUGGESTION1 applied; both fields have good coverage. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Intraday reversal at extreme eod_high vs ton_last
results.description: Combine news_eod_high and news_ton_last to detect overstretched intraday highs relative to time-of-news. SUGGESTION1 used; high coverage. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Post-news persistence adjusted by moving average volume
results.description: Uses news_pct_60min and news_mov_vol to prefer moves with sustained volume. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 applied (mov_vol high alphaCount). Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Volatility breakout with low prior volatility
results.description: Combines news_pct_30min and inverse of news_atr14 to pick breakouts in previously quiet stocks. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: EOD VWAP-gap mean reversion
results.description: Uses news_post_vwap and news_ton_last to trade reversion to post-session VWAP. SUGGESTION1 applied; fields high coverage. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Overnight momentum continuation using prevday and 10min move
results.description: Combine news_prevday and news_pct_10min to capture names that keep trending after overnight impetus. SUGGESTION1 applied; coverage adequate. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Low-liquidity breakout (low mov_vol) amplified moves
results.description: Uses inverse of news_mov_vol and news_max_up_ret to capture amplified moves in illiquid names. SUGGESTION1 applied; mov_vol high coverage. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Intraday mean reversion using session range vs 30min move
results.description: Combines news_session_range and news_pct_30min. session_range coverage low so applied ts_backfill(5). SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION3 used. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: SPY-relative intraday reversal
results.description: Uses news_indx_perf and news_pct_30min to find names diverging from market then reverting. SUGGESTION1 applied; both high coverage. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Weekend-news carry (prevclose momentum into open)
results.description: Combines news_prev_close (low coverage — backfilled) and news_open to trade carry. Applied SUGGESTION3 ts_backfill for prev_close. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Intraday range expansion with low volstddev
results.description: Combines news_range_stddev and news_vol_stddev to select names where price expands without volume spike (potential mean-revert). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum confirmation by multiple timeframes (1min and 30min)
results.description: Combines news_pct_1min and news_pct_30min for multi-timeframe confirmation. SUGGESTION1 used; both coverages high. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Rapid reversal after max up amount
results.description: Uses news_max_up_amt and news_mins_1_chg to fade quick spikes in price. SUGGESTION1 used; both high coverage. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Large-cap momentum filter (cap-weighted moves)
results.description: Combines news_cap and news_pct_60min to prefer momentum in large caps. SUGGESTION1 applied; news_cap strong coverage and userCount. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Volume ratio breakout (curr_vol / mov_vol) with price follow-through
results.description: Uses news_ratio_vol and news_pct_30min to find volume-backed moves. news_ratio_vol coverage ~0.51 so applied ts_backfill(5). SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION3 used. Confidence 0.6.

results.description: Combines news_pct_90min and news_atr14 to select sustained moves with manageable volatility. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.64.

results.description: Uses news_pct_30sec and news_tot_ticks to favor micro-moves with high activity. SUGGESTION1 used; both high coverage. Confidence 0.7.

results.description: Combines news_prevday with news_atr14 to predict next-session intraday volatility. SUGGESTION1 applied; both sufficient coverage. Confidence 0.58.

results.description: Uses news_tot_ticks and news_curr_vol to find names where many ticks occur on low volume (potential manipulation/momentum). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: EOD reversion when EODClose deviates from post_vwap
results.description: Combines news_eod_close and news_post_vwap to capture close-vwap reversion opportunities. SUGGESTION1 used; coverages high. Confidence 0.61.

results.description: Uses news_pct_1min and news_vol_stddev to select follow-through in volatile names. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.62.

results.description: Combines news_pct_30min and news_spy_close (or spy_last) to pick idiosyncratic leaders. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Big-range contrarian: high range but low follow-through
results.description: Uses news_session_range_pct and news_pct_60min to fade names with big session range but weak 60min follow-through. session_range_pct low coverage -> ts_backfill applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Momentum scaled by market cap & volatility
results.description: Combines news_pct_30min, news_cap, and news_atr14 (use two datafields only constraint: combine cap and pct, scale by atr via ts_zscore of atr integrated into multiply). SUGGESTION2 not used; SUGGESTION4 applied. Confidence 0.6.

results.idea: Pre-vwap fade after large open move
results.description: Uses news_open and news_pre_vwap to fade extreme open moves before session. SUGGESTION1 used; both coverages >0.7. Confidence 0.58.

results.description: Combines news_pct_10min and news_pct_30min for stronger signal when both align. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Earnings momentum when EPS and PE ratio both favorable
results.description: Combines news_eps_actual and news_pe_ratio to go long strong EPS in cheap stocks. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 used. Confidence 0.71.

results.description: Uses news_mins_3_chg and news_pct_3min to capture quick mean reversion after 3-minute spikes. SUGGESTION1 applied; coverages high. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Low-turnover breakout: high pct with low tot_ticks
results.description: Combines news_pct_30min and inverse news_tot_ticks to find breakouts with low tick activity (potential alpha). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.54.

results.description: Uses news_atr14 and news_pct_30min: prefer momentum only if ATR elevated (regime change). SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.61.

results.description: Combines news_open_gap and news_curr_vol to fade gaps with low supporting volume; news_open_gap coverage ~0.624 so acceptable. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.description: Combine news_eps_actual and inverse news_atr14 to hold winners with low volatility. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.66.

results.description: Uses news_vol_stddev and news_range_stddev to select names showing volume volatility increases but range contraction (signaling buildup). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence 0.58.
